short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension synchronize bookmarks from a Strapi server. cf https://github.com/julienfroidefond/bookmarks-cms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is a part of a self-hosted sharing bookmarks project.

It needs a Strapi server configured. (Please refer to this : https://github.com/julienfroidefond/bookmarks-cms). By default, it will use a demo site (https://bookmarks-cms.herokuapp.com/) to consume the API.

You need in options to configure your proper server URL / and Strapi jwt Token.

Features :
- Consumes API
- show in a hierarchical way the bookmarks
- auto synchronize (cf options by default every hours)
 
This tool is used by Cdiscount company to share links. 
In development right now.
